column4: there is a panel on my desktop which can't be deleted, is there another way to delete it?
is there any error message?  perhaps try to remove it as root
how would i go removing it as root, doesnt root access only work on nautilus and cli? Well i right click it and the delete option is greyed out which aint supposed to happen
what is the name of that folder?  in console  try doing     stat  Desktop/name_of_that_folder   to see its permissions status
